comment: I'm not a big eye fan but this one surprised me. Tart cherries and vanilla greet you and lead into a peppery finish that lingers. Definately enjoyed.
Sightly sweet, smooth, slight fire. Mild aftertaste.

Something new! Light, sweet, nice flavor. A little lightweight, but good complexity. A little touch of cedar, some rye spice, super approachable. I like it a lot better than the old forester rye. This would be an easy four-star pick for me if it was a 100 proof. It just needs a little more age & horsepower

A GLOVE FRY
A VERY GOLF
FARGO LEVY
GRAVY FLOE
VALEY FROG
AGO FLY REV
Tart cherries, cinnamon and clove. Some vanilla. Paper spice! Bit of nut and black tea corn.
Not much of anything. Definitely not worth the price.
